title: Santos to Cut Workforce by 10% After Slump in Annual Profit
description: Santos Ltd. is targeting a 10% headcount reduction after Australia’s second-biggest natural gas producer reported a slump in profit on lower oil and gas prices.
content: Santos Ltd. is targeting a 10% headcount reduction after Australia’s second-biggest natural gas producer reported a slump in profit on lower oil and gas prices.
